Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIc bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Closticin 574 is, on the basis of the nucleotide sequence of its structural gene, produced as preproprotein of 309 amino acid residues. After secretion and processing, it gives rise to an antimicrobial peptide of 82 amino acid residues.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of two novel clostridial bacteriocins, circularin A and closticin 574.
Literature.Author: Kemperman R, Kuipers A, Karsens H, Nauta A, Kuipers O, Kok J.
